name: Ladybug.LostKids
description:
Ladybug: Lost Kids.

The platformer game project for GameOff 2021.

Save kids!

Movement: A, D, ←, →, Gamepad Left Stick, D-Pad

Jump: Space, Gamepad (A)

Run: Shift, Gamepad (X), Left Stick

Interact: E, Gamepad (X)

Kick: Mouse Right Button, Gamepad (Left Trigger)

Toxic Spit Mouse Left Button, Gamepad (Right Trigger)

Ain: Mouse, Gamepad Right Stick

You can fly shortly with several jumps

You can spit on things to make more dangerous cannons out of them
